title: Tempting Tears
description: Vance Hardin was prepared to let her chase him until she was good and caught. As head security for Club D/s, he watches and waits, biding his time until one night the chance he’s been waiting for finally arrives. She wants to play and he’s been invited along for the erotic journey.Used to having fun, adrenaline junkie Aubrey Collins wasn’t at all prepared for what playing with Vance would do not only to her body but to her emotions. Used to footloose-and-fancy-free, no-strings-attached friendships, she soon learns such a relationship is not an option.In her submission to Vance, Aubrey will discover that being single and having fun have absolutely nothing to do with Novel is a stand-alone, however, for better reader enjoyment, we recommend reading Tied and Temping first.
author: Maggie Casper
